unnormalised: Arre yaar, linear algebra was quite the headache back in my B.Tech days! I remember struggling with matrix transformations. Prof. Sharma made us solve like, 50 questions from the textbook, Ch. 3. It was supposed to prep us for the exam on 12/12/2022 but honestly, I still barely passed with a 40%. Wish I'd understood eigenvectors and eigenvalues better back then. Now, they're like some hazy dream from my past! Maybe I should revisit those concepts sometime using Khan Academy; hear they explain it well.
